website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use fan for budget-conscious shoppers.
pros: This fan is easy to assemble for everyone
The pricepoint is affordable and the color is a crisp white
An all around efficient ceiling fan
cons: Only for indoors – cannot be used outside

customer_reviews.title: QUIET, PRETTY AND EASY TO INSTALL!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this installed in my bedroom for a while now and I absolutely love it. It is quiet and functional. What more could I want? It was easy to install as well. I am a 66 year-old woman who didn't want to pay someone to install the little critter, so I gave it a shot. A friend came over at one point to hold it up while I hooked up the wires, but it was soooo easy! Hunter fans rock!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these fans for my basement which has a low ceiling. They have been running on medium for 3 months ever since. They are quiet, and installation only took about 1.5 hours to do both of them. The low profile is great when you need the clearance and don't require lighting. The finish and appearance is great, and they move a good amount of air without being overwhelming or blowing papers all over the room. If you are just looking to circulate air and you don't need a fan to cool off an entire room, then this fan is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Wayneo

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan, it's powerful for it's size!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller fan for a bedroom in a basement. This thing is perfect. It's a smaller size and it still pushes around a ton of air --- so much I usually find myself lowering the setting because it's making it too chilly! It's also dead quiet, I almost never notice it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Junk in a Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to be installed in our vacation home, based on the brand (which, in the past, had been well-regarded) and the positive reviews (which I now regard skeptically). When my contractor attempted to install it-- unfortunately after the return date had passed-- he found (1) the internal wiring appeared to be messed up, (2) the remote wouldn't pair with the fan and (3) the fan made a racket when turned on. So now I'm stuck with an $80 piece of junk. I know you get what you pay for, but in this case I'm $80 short of even that.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Noisy! Hunter quality is not what it was
customer_reviews.text: I have installed numerous Hunter fans over the years. This one is one of the WORST. Appearance of the fan is fantastic, however, the motor makes an audible wom, wom, wom (hum sound) which makes it impossible to sleep in the bedroom where this fan is installed. I ordered a replacement, made the time consuming effort of uninstalling/reinstalling the replacement. The replacement was WORSE. I am done with Hunter fans and will never buy them again. While the fan looks great, the made-in-china motor quality is horrible. I have returned the original and the replacement and will never buy their product again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: This fan really blows me away!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I bought this fan! Its both efficient and super quiet (even on high speed), so perfect for the bedroom. Our house has very low ceilings so I was specifically looking for a fan that takes up minimal space from the ceiling to the bottom. This one is only goes down about 9" so it works perfectly over the bed. It is a good quality fan at a very reasonable price. I can't comment on the ease of installation personally, but my husband didn't seem to have any problems (he is not an electrician or anything like that). I highly recommend this fan, especially for anyone with low ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Gitte

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, low profile but fat
customer_reviews.text: Easy Install, very quiet, seems to move air nicely.... but needlessly large housing cover. The mounting bracket for the fan is huge, which gives it the stability to not wobble. The downside of that, though, is that the housing is also huge. The motor is no bigger than my fist, but the housing is the size of my coffeemaker. It gives an overbearing feeling to what could be small and sleek. Low profile (distance from the ceiling) but fat on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: 1860renovation

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of this fan
customer_reviews.text: After buying this fan, and then I finally got an installer after re-doing the room I was putting it in. . When we finally got the whole fan up in the ceiling, it didn’t work. I had to pay the electrician to uninstall it while I ran to a local Home Depot to pick up another fan and reinstall that. Was not worth the effort. I was told to contact the Manufacturer HUNTER FAN CO and they said there’s nothing they can do except return it to Amazon and Amazon says return it to the manufacture. I will never buy a hunter fan again
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Banks

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is exactly what we needed in our tv room. The room is not large, this size is perfect. It has zero noise and was easy to install. We did not get the remote control. I saw in some of the reviews issues with this fan being noisy. This one is not. Very happy and would recommend if you’re in the market for a small fan.
customer_reviews.author: mimi of 7

customer_reviews.title: Body is bigger than I'd thought for a "low profile" fan....  but I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Hunter has always been good. I needed to replace an old one that started making too much noise and I could not keep lubricating the bearing... so I got this one. For $80... it's awesome! The body (casing) was big for what I thought I was getting... so it's not subtle. But it's super quiet like the rest of them and it's awesome. Installation was easy once I figured out what hardware I needed to transition from the old one to this one to attach to the electrical box and then I was home free. I'd recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Doll

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Th fan came as advertised. It was easy to install. The fan is only 42 inches in diameter, so it is perfect for a smaller room. I installed mine in a small bedroom, and it works perfectly. Runs quietly, and move a good volume of air. I would recommend this fan to others who a looking for a small ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Quality ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: We are remodeling our kitchen & replacing an adequate ceiling fan with this Hunter. As I have an aversion to electricity, I hired an electrician to redo the wiring & install the fan. My wife wanted a flush mounted white fan. This Hunter ceiling fan pushes the air in our kitchen quite well. It is absolutely quiet. I highly recommend this fan. I will also update this review in a few months
customer_reviews.author: roundrocker

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: As a home owner this is my 8th install of a fan and was by far the easiest, normally you need to made a hanger to hold the heavy motor while you wire it but not with this unit. The bracket mounts to the ceiling and the motor slips in for wiring, super easy. Product registration is a snap take a picture and text it. Hunter has come a long way and is the best, they lost their way for a few years but they have it together now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan for small rooms, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a great addition to my new bedroom, looks great, good quality, easy to install and above all I got it for only $63.99 on sale, it arrived with no problems, I installed and balanced the fan blades to avoid wobbaling very easily and connected it to a DHOUSE Light Switch which is wifi and works with Alexa so all I need to do is ask Alexa to turn on the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Dray RC

customer_reviews.title: Great as an overhead couch fan - very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Our fan not that easy to install since it replaced an older fan with different bracket mounting - that was the hardest part to properly center under ceiling support blocks above the dry wall; but the low-weight motor was nice to place. Otherwise, pretty straight forward, even youtube had a helpful sequential video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install IF you have ALL the pieces🙄
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of this little fan and actually went up fairly easy until the end and I was missing 3 small screws. Customer Service at Hunter said they can order the screws and send to me., other than that, return it. Since it was 1/2 up..figured I would get my own screws (how hard can it be right?): HD = no, Lowe’s = no , thankfully a little local hardware store had exactly what I needed. Thank you Cliff at the local Farmers Union. I just received a letter from Hunter saying they ordered my screws (it’s been 2 weeks). Oh well..it’s up, works and looks great👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: DBosco

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Operation - Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It spins... it creates a cooling breeze.. it make no noise at all. And it was under my budget of 100 dollars. Exactly what I was looking for in a ceiling fan. They market it as "Whisper Quiet"... but I don't even hear a whisper. I read another review about a clicking noise it made. Well if you fail to tighten down the blade screws... there is a chance for noise due to the close clearance tolerances of the blade screws. Just follow the direction... and you'll be fine. I think this fan is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, good quality
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our bedroom to add a bit of white noise and air flow overnight. It literally makes no noise, but it looks great and functions well, so we can't complain. The body is a little bulky, so if you're looking for something that sits flat to the ceiling, this might be a bit too substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Good Quiet Fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple fan with good installation instructions. Fairly straightforward process with nice results. Fan is quiet but definitely does the job and has helped us cut down on our A/C usage in the bedroom where we installed it. Ours didn't come with a remote but we didn't need one.
customer_reviews.author: Carys O.

customer_reviews.title: TY WRAP INSIDE FAN MAKES TOO MUCH  NOIKSE
customer_reviews.text: I have several rental properties and I have had such good results with them, I try to use Hunter fans in all my properties. When I finished installing this fan there was a periodic noise when the fan blades were turning. Someone, while manufacturing the fan, secured two wires together using a small white Ty Wrap. It was 2 inches too long, and rather than clipping off the excess, they left it and it dropped down into the rotating part of the fan, making the unwanted noise. This required almost complete disassembly to remedy. This was very frustrating and unnecessary. Assemblers, pay attention!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tomosunas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our Master Bath
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes a ceiling fan in the Master Bath, and Hunter is a good fan company. We had this installed when we built our new home. It is quiet, flush mount, and circulates the air well.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Darling

customer_reviews.title: The most complicated install of any fan
customer_reviews.text: It felt like engineers got together and said, "how can we make this as complicated as possible for the buyer". I have installed enough fans in my time that I do not look at any instructions any more, but this gem was one of a kind. From the overly large ceiling bracket to 3 levels of hardware AND IT DID NOT EVEN HAVE LIGHTS!!! How can you make it this complicated! This fan gave me 3 "rage" moments!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Blocker

customer_reviews.title: So far we LOVE it!  A great fan for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a 200+ year house, so installing anything can be a nightmare. The fan took my husband a day to install, but that included removing floor boards upstairs to locate wires, etc. It is in now, and we are so pleased with it! I would recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: kathy w.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking fan for the price, usual Hunter quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the price. Note, if you purchase the remote control and are installing 2 in close proximity, there is a programming sequence to prevent either controller from controlling both fans. Instructions not included with remote units, but Hunter has great customer sevice and can supply the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: GMI

customer_reviews.title: There is an imperfect fix for a loose motor
customer_reviews.text: The design is nice for the entry level Hunter fan. Install should have been easy, but two stars off for the issue of the motor not properly securing to the base without modification. I needed to bend the metal plate for the machine screws inward in order to make contact and secure the motor. Pretty frustrated considering this brand is supposed to be one of the best. They apparently needed to provide a "you get what you pay for" experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Good air flow.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a fan that did more than look good. With the Hunter 51070 we have found the perfect fan for us.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Factory defect. Returned and replaced with a new one.
customer_reviews.text: We hired an electrician to install the fan. He found that the old fan being replaced was incorrectly hung so he had to add a new brace in the ceiling. Then he found that the new fan had a factory defect so we had to return it and have him back to install the replacement fan. Our bill for the electrician was more than it should have been because he had to come back.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Van Curen

customer_reviews.title: hunter 51060 Low Profile III 42" 5 blade ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Got this fan cause I have 8' ceiling in my office and it fit the bill. I added a universal light kit that I got from our local HD store. Looks great, runs great, very silent and moves the air in a small 10' x 10' very well. I got the Hunter 99123 Universal celing fan & light remote so I wouldn't have to run a new 14-3 wire, I could use my existing 14-2 wiring. This fan came with 5 blades just as the picture showed not what it was described 4 blades. I preferred 5 blades, better balance and moves the air well.
customer_reviews.author: 2hawk feathers

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan that keeps the room nice and cool
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a ceiling fan for an open space in my home and I chose the Hunter 42 inch Low Peofile IV fan. I had a professional install the fan because I have no expertise or skills in this area. The fan is great- perfect size for the room, keeps the room nice and cool, and it actually is QUIET! Definitely will buy Hunter fans in the future!
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Has been up a few weeks. It works well and is quiet and was easy to install. Looking into getting a similar but larger one with a light kit for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and unobtrusive fan does its job
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fine little fans for my low-ceilinged summer cottage on the shore. They're nearly silent and do a fine job moving the air.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTee

customer_reviews.title: This Hugger Fan Fit the Bill!
customer_reviews.text: I had a height restriction in the bedroom where I was installing a ceiling fan. This fan kit allowed me to mount the fan body and blades snug to the ceiling giving me the extra space needed. Good quality fan for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan at a really affordable price. I chose this fan because it's low profile without a light which was exactly what I needed. Super easy to install and is very quiet but gives a powerful air flow and keeps the room nice and cool. It's a small fan so works well for smaller rooms.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Fan failed to work on electrians connection
customer_reviews.text: Electrician attempted to connect the fan. He told me the fan is defective. I had to buy a replacement locally plus pay electrician's time.
customer_reviews.author: William C Haseltine

customer_reviews.title: Great, but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and looks great. My only complaint so far is that it makes more noise than I wanted. It kind of clicks with every rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon U

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly we are not crazy about this fan at all. It wasn’t too bad to install. We have purchased Hunter fans before and been very happy. However this one does not put out any air at all, and we wish that we could get it going a little bit faster the speed is way too slow even on high. Would not purchase again and would not recommend. It is a quiet fan though.
customer_reviews.author: Powerwalker

customer_reviews.title: Low Profile Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Having a room with low ceilings make it a challenge to fit in a fan. This fan was perfect! It is indeed low profile. Easy to understand assembly instructions made it better. Step by step I was walked thru getting this fan up. It is virtually silent. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Hunter ceiling fan without a light kit. But could not find one at Lowe's or home Depot. This is what I was looking for. Very quiet can't hear.
customer_reviews.author: CinThor

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice fans work perfect in the space I have. I ordered 3 the same I have the wood ceilings they match is nice. Easy to install after the first one I can do them in about 15 minutes. Put the blades together first rubber grommets go inside the screw holes on the blade. Great product 👍! Thx! Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit. Good quality. Shipped perfect. Amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: The thing work GREAT! What a deal for the price! Quality unit works fine! Get this! They put in a special package containing extra parts in case you drop a screw in the carpet or...
customer_reviews.author: YTOKFISH

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Hunter fans are very quiet - this model is no exception. Great for a smaller room
customer_reviews.author: Smokeymike

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: We loved this so much we bought four more and replaced all the fans in our house. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Motherearthheaven

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: No remote control in package !’ Does not circulate much air ! Had to supplement with a floor fan
customer_reviews.author: bluechip

customer_reviews.title: VERY QUIET!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, very quiet. Was leery about a fan on amazon, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MRS D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fan
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, good quality product at a great price. It is easily as quiet as the more expensive fans we have in other rooms and just as good looking. The smaller size is perfect for the room its in.
customer_reviews.author: cara joly

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: No remote control...pretty straight forward directions...use this size to replace a 52 inch fan for roughly a 10×12 room..works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim&Chris

customer_reviews.title: Adorable fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great fashionable working fan. Instructions for installation were simple, not complicated. Shipped right away & arrived as scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Anna DD

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for large finished room above garage. Quiet and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: John Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Motor died after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: We have had this fan for almost exactly 1 month and the motor died after only occasional use in our guest room. We always thought Hunter was a good name for ceiling fans. We are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a customer. Not sure how it is going. Have not gotten a call back. Good thing
customer_reviews.author: Tombahamas

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Noise level is minimal and speed is good. Keeps our family room cool.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Parts were missing ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: missing screws for the Pull switch...it is now just hanging there...will never buy a Hunter Product again....Every 1 that comes over also agrees...they will not touch a Hunter Fan......and after this review....it is still the same way....Fck Hunter Fans...
customer_reviews.author: james gilhooly

customer_reviews.title: Judging a company by its product.
customer_reviews.text: Still not installed but am driven to compliment this company for the most helpful and comprehensive set of instructions that I’ve seen in years. Tired of the endless stream of instructions composed by third- graders, this set was not only a pleasant surprise but a big relief. Ready to hang, with which I’ll need some help, I have no doubt that if it doesn’t hum, these folks will stay with me until I get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan (no pun intended) of AC, and this ceiling fan keeps air circulating just enough to keep the room cool.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quiet great quality fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan and looks amazing! Nice n quiet and very great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy install for our electrician. It blends in with the ceiling and is flush so provides maximum space. Very quiet and works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Parillo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, install was tricky. Really like performance.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and arrived in couple of days ,not weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and quiet. Works for me solely from the pull chain.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quite.
customer_reviews.text: So quite, would'not know it was on except for the breeze. Nice Looking too. Hired somebody to install.
customer_reviews.author: helen p. cronin

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great. Only wish is had lights included
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan for low ceiling
customer_reviews.text: This fan was perfect for our low 7ft ceiling. The fan is so quite that you can barley hear it running.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Took me 2 1/2 hours to unmount and install the new fan (first time installing a fan). Easy to put together and easy to install. Nice looking and very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter’s room! It puts out an impressive amount of air for such a small fan! We ordered another one for my son’s room (in the dark color)
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

customer_reviews.title: No noise!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for my guest bedroom and makes no noise. I definitely can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great fan I put it under the porch of my wife's she shed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Strain

customer_reviews.title: Good for Confined Areas
customer_reviews.text: Low profile was perfect since I had this installed in my garage and the space was rather tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but cheap construction compared to other fans I have installed.
customer_reviews.text: Works, but a bit crudely made. There is a small gap against the ceiling although it's supposed to be flush mount. And somehow the motor doesn't hang in the center of the housing. Noise level is moderate.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelm Rossini

customer_reviews.title: Works like expected.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, seemed to be an easy installation by an electrician. Looks kind of bulky but that's okay. They cool the small rooms comfortably in 100+ weather along with the w/o.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Finta

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan, good quality, works perfect and super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Totally silent.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, may buy more. Totally silent and close enough to the ceiling that it is hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: I love it. No light though but my ceiling is very low
customer_reviews.author: Mariette Gable

customer_reviews.title: Low profile quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: More flimsy than the 30 year old model it replaced. Otherwise very satisfactory!
customer_reviews.author: Toughshopper

customer_reviews.title: does exactly what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: My old ceiling fan kicked the bucket and my wife was not enthusiastic about replacing it. I convinced her that the hole in the ceiling left with the removal of a fan that didn't work was not esthetic and I searched for a replacement. This fan met all of our requirements: it is silent, remote controlled and does not intrude in the space of the room it is ensconced in. Definitely recommended for a small room! If you need a large area serviced this is not the fan for you.
customer_reviews.author: allan naarden

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Fan
customer_reviews.text: Great price and looks good. The only problem is no air movement ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for use in a room with a lower ceiling. The Hunter brand is very dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Y. Sinna

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Its quiet and runs smoothly. Not to hard to install. No remote control for this fan
customer_reviews.author: Tom McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Small-great for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: Very Quiet. Nice looking. Small-great for small rooms. We love our new fans. They blend right in and our fans no longer make the room feel smaller. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: EAP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: What were we waiting for? We finally purchased ceiling fans and we are so pleased. These are lovely and very quiet. Separately purchased remotes work great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P. Moloney

customer_reviews.title: Great Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a low profile ceiling fan that sort of disappears into your ceiling, definitely go with this. I've installed four of them and it's always painless and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Motor Made Noise from the Initial Install
customer_reviews.text: A loud buzzing sound came from the fan from initial install. The second you hit the switch, it makes the sound, so it doesn't appear to be install related. Replaced it with a different fan from a different company that is is absolutely silent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: this fan was TINY! could not use returned no problem, make sure you look at the dimensions of this
customer_reviews.author: higgs

customer_reviews.title: Great value...quiet...efficient...looks great in casual living room!
customer_reviews.text: Love it....quiet...don't even know its on..several speeds. Was worried it was too small when we saw fan blades but turned out to look great!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: This one by far was the worst designed pos I have ever dealt with
customer_reviews.text: Been installing fans for over 30 years. This one by far was the worst designed pos I have ever dealt with. I do not believe it is a Hunter fan. Had to immediately remove due to humming noise and serous contact from shroud and fan blade mounts. Love Hunter fans but this one is not worthy of the Hunter name. Cheap, poor design and bad construction. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, understated, nice muted tones and great for the $$
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a smaller fan, bought this one and are very pleased. The antique pewter is a pleasing color - you could match this up with oil rubbed bronze or even chrome or nickle and it would look nice. The blades are dark expresso color and go well with the metal finish. Two speeds, but that works for us. We would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for 2 bedrooms. Happy with purchase. They don't look and perform like quality ceiling fans sized just right for somewhat low ceiling bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: mom2boys

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We put this up in about an hour. It is very quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: These, I bought 2, are great room fans. Nice looking, we'll bolt and easy to install. I paired them with Hunter's remote control and couldn't be more pleased. Exactly as described by seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The squeak has gotten worse and the fan will have to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: We had this fan installed in a bedroom in our new home by a professional. After a week it began to squeak loudly on high speed. The squeak has gotten worse and the fan will have to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: megan Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: like the fan, speed is good. the pull chain is very short, had to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Varuna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Hunter Fan!

product_meta.title: Hunter Fan Company Hunter 51059 Transitional 42'' Ceiling Fan from Low Profile IV collection in White Finish
product_meta.description: Size:42"| Color:WhiteNeed a fan for a small room with a traditional 8-foot or low 7-foot ceiling? Hunter's Low Profile IV is painstakingly designed and handcrafted for small space functionality. Hunter combines 19th century craftsmanship with 21st century design and technology to create ceiling fans of unmatched quality, style and whisper-quiet performance. Using the finest materials to create stylish designs, Hunter ceiling fans work beautifully in today's homes and can save up to 47% on cooling costs. The Low Profile IV is no exception, delivering an airflow of 2, 902 CFM in an efficient low ceiling design. The three-speed Whisper Wind quiet motor gives you all the cooling power you want, without the noise you don't. Traditionally styled in designer white with white blades, its clean lines are at home with antiques or modern furnishings. Use it in small rooms (up to 100 square feet) with ceilings 8 feet and under - the motor housing fits flush to give you the most clearance possible. Simple and safe to install for even the inexperienced Dyer. Hunter's limited lifetime motor warranty is backed by the only company with 126 years in the business. Includes one three inch down rod. Not compatible with Hunter Original down rods. Troubleshoot-for noisy operation tighten the blade and blade iron screws until they are snug.
feature_bullets: Whisper Wind motor delivers ultra powerful air movement with whisper quiet performance so you get the cooling power you want without the noise you don’t
Reversible motor allows you to change the direction of your fan from downdraft mode during the summer to updraft mode during the winter
13 degree blade pitch optimized to ensure ideal air movement and peak performance
Included pull chain allows for quick and easy on/off and speed adjustments
Limited lifetime motor warranty is backed by the only company with over 125 years in the fan business
